articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
$SAFE will be non-transferable at first meaning it can not be traded.
Moreover, 50% of the airdrop is vesting over 4yrs, the other half is claimable immediately.
Will be interesting to see whether this will align the community more long-term with @safe.
DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: $SAFE token is here!!!
Start the claim process by going into your Gnosis Safe and opening the $SAFE claim app.
The rest is easy 🫡
 https://twitter.com/safe/status/1575047966183653376

articles.description:
Re Conic is supposed to go live in 2-3 weeks.
LP's in their Omnipool will be able to stake on Convex and receive $CVX, $CRV and $CNC.
The idea is that by LP'ing in multiple pools you get exposure to higher yield pools while diversifying risk.

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re Step 4: Mint the Proof-of-Humanity badge to the "destination" wallet.
This NFT badge proves you're a human and a project could require its users to have such a badge in order to be eligible for an airdrop.
There's no way to trace a badge back to its "source" account.
articles.title: Re Step 4: Mint the Proof-of-Humanity badge to the "destination" wallet. This NFT badge proves you're a human and a project could require its users to...

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re Step 3: Select a "destination" wallet.
This is the wallet which you actually use, with your assets and transaction data but which you don't want to dox.
Switch wallet and then sign a new message with it to prove you own that wallet as well.
articles.title: Re Step 3: Select a "destination" wallet. This is the wallet which you actually use, with your assets and transaction data but which you don't want to...

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re Step 2: Go to 
Sign a message to prove you have ownership over this wallet containing the proof-of-humanity profile. https://alpha.sismo.io/proof-of-humanity
articles.title: Re Step 2: Go to Sign a message to prove you have ownership over this wallet containing the proof-of-humanity profile.

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re Step 1: Create a @proofofhumanity profile with a fresh wallet ( requires uploading a video, in which you show a sign & speak)
Once you tie your PoH profile to that wallet, the wallet is doxxed.
But you don't care, you're never going to use it. https://www.proofofhumanity.id/
articles.title: Re Step 1: Create a @proofofhumanity profile with a fresh wallet ( requires uploading a video, in which you show a sign & speak) Once you tie your PoH...

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re Not unlikely that future big airdrops will require such a "uniqueness" check to avoid the same people "farming" an airdrop with multiple addresses (e.g deposit $10 in a vault with 100 addresses).
So how to prove uniqueness?
articles.title: Re Not unlikely that future big airdrops will require such a "uniqueness" check to avoid the same people "farming" an airdrop with multiple addresses ...

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re For example, prove you have > 100 $ETH in your wallet w/o disclosing the wallet address.
Prove you own a @cryptopunksnfts without showing which punk.
Prove you are a unique human who did a @proofofhumanity check without disclosing your name + video.
